name: Push Google Sheets values to Cyfe
description: Every time a new row is added to your Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically push the new data in your Cyfe widget. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1UUP8arJB1WUmHjaILAd_bcfvWJvF9qEJmZIQeUMU-Nw/edit?usp=sharing).
